title: Childrens Jewelry, Boy or Girls Necklace, Sterling Silver Medal Sm Oval Miraculous Medal St. Mary Mother of God with 16" Stainless Steel Chain Gift Boxed
Product_description: The Meaning of the Front Side of the Miraculous Medal Mary is standing upon a globe, crushing the head of a serpent beneath her foot. She stands upon the globe, as the Queen of Heaven and Earth. Her feet crush the serpent to proclaim Satan and all his followers are helpless before her (Gn 3:15). The year of 1830 on the Miraculous Medal is the year the Blessed Mother gave the design of the Miraculous Medal to Saint Catherine Labour?. The reference to Mary conceived without sin supports the dogma of the Immaculate Conception of Mary?not to be confused with the virgin birth of Jesus, and referring to Mary's sinlessness, ?full of grace÷ and ?blessed among women÷ (Luke 1:28)?that was proclaimed 24 years later in 1854. The vision turned and showed the design of the reverse side of the medal. Twelve stars encircled a large "M" from which arose a cross. Below are two hearts with flames arising from them. One heart is encircled in thorns and the other is pierced by a sword. The Meaning of the Back Side of the Miraculous Medal The twelve stars can refer to the Apostles, who represent the entire Church as it surrounds Mary. They also recall the vision of Saint John, writer of the Book of Revelation (12:1), in which ?a great sign appeared in heaven, a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of 12 stars.÷ The cross can symbolize Christ and our redemption, with the bar under the cross a sign of the earth. The ?M÷ stands for Mary, and the interleaving of her initial and the cross shows Mary?s close involvement with Jesus and our world. In this we see Mary?s part in our salvation and her role as mother of the Church. The two hearts represent the love of Jesus and Mary for us. (See also Lk 2:35).

title: Therm Wind and Waterproof Lightweight Rain Jacket With Magic Print
description: All-Weather Wear: From a brisk breeze to pop-up showers, our jackets are a great go-to for any season! Windproof and waterproof up to 3,000mm, they’ll keep kids dry in 3 hours of steady rain and even have a cozy microfleece lining for thermal protection.

Magic Print: With its water-activated print, kids will be eager to slip on their rainwear jacket before heading out the door! They’ll love showing off the magic design, while parents will appreciate the reflective trim and logo for added visibility in low light.

Designed for Comfort: Design details like a high neck, longer back, zipper pockets and thumbholes in the cuffs (size 4+) offer extra protection and comfort! But because our waterproof coat remains incredibly lightweight, kids are still free to move, play or explore without restriction.

Washing Machine Safe: Thanks to our durable polyester Bedford shell, these water-resistant jackets handle just about anything kids put them through! They’re even safe in the washer and dryer, so dirt, mud and accidental spills are problems of the past.

Satisfaction Guarantee. Please note these jackets may have an unpleasant smell upon receipt, due to the specialized waterproof/magic coating on the fabric. The smell will disappear completely after the item is removed from the plastic packaging.
Product_description: Regardless of the weather, kids are always ready to get outside and begin their newest adventure.
Unfortunately, their clothing just can’t keep up. Most jackets lack any type of thermal protection,
while some raincoats aren’t even waterproof.
With a Lightweight Rain Jacket from Therm, kids can face whatever Mother Nature throws their
way! Boasting 3,000mm water and windproof protection, it’s a must-have on wet or cloudy days.
Complete with our ultra-soft microfleece lining, it’ll keep your little one warm and cozy without
causing them to overheat.
But what makes our jacket a real winner with kids is the magic print design! Activated by rain or
water, it appears when wet for a special surprise. Reflective details on the front and back provide
added visibility in low light while thumbholes in the cuffs help keep small hands warm. With a
high neck, chin guard and longer back, our coat offers total comfort and protection!
Made with a polyester Bedford shell, Therm is delivering quality you can trust! Lightweight yet
durable, this incredible fabric won’t restrict your child’s movements. The best part? It’s safe in
both the washer and dryer for a truly hassle-free clean.
*Stock is limited. Order today to ensure availability.

Product_description: A Vegvísir (Icelandic 'sign post' or 'wayfinder') is an Icelandic magical stave intended to help the bearer find their way through rough weather. The symbol is attested in the Huld Manuscript, collected in Iceland by Geir Vigfusson in 1880 (but consisting of material of earlier origin). A leaf of the manuscript provides an image of the vegvísir, gives its name, and, in prose, declares that "if this sign is carried, one will never lose one's way in storms or bad weather, even when the way is not known".

title: Genuine U.S. Military Issue CELTIC CROSS With Beaded Chain - 24"
Product_description: The Celtic Cross is a symbol that combines the Cross with a Ring surrounding the intersection. It is the characteristic symbol of Celtic Christianity, though the symbol has older, pre-Christian origins. Such Crosses formed a major part of Celtic art. This design is also referred to as the High Cross, Irish Cross, or the Cross of Iona. Made tough for the many Protestant Americans serving in our Armed Forces, this Genuine U.S. Military Issue Celtic Cross is precision carved out of non-magnetic, non-reactive, brite finished, 100% 304 stainless steel. It has a 24" stainless steel dog tag chain and is 1 1/8" tall x 11/16" wide x 3/32" thick. NSN 9925-01-542-8789

Product_description: Orgone energy devices assist in cleansing, releasing, re-aligning... producing healing energetic resonances around the wearer and within the immediate environment. Their affects are subtle and gradual - thought energy is key.
How These Orgone Devices Work:

These devices consist primarily of concentrated organic matter in the form of resin; inorganic matter in the form of metals; and conductors in the form of crystals. The organic resin exerts negative ionic charges and the inorganic metals exert positive ionic charges. When housed in such close formation, the excitation of these ionic charges draw subtle energies from the environment. In combination with quartz crystals and other semi-precious stones, these devices continuously transmute lower incoherent energy drawn in from the environment into higher coherent frequencies inherent in the crystalline signatures of the stones. These higher frequencies are continuously generated, transmitting vibrations of harmony & balance out into the environment and into one's energy fields.
Please note: The back sides tend to be slightly rough due to irregular size of gemstones and metal chips.

The harmonizers pendants may get a little dull due to body heat, as well as in hot humid/sunny conditions. Cool/indirect sunlight seem to preserve the resin’s luster. Like most jewelry, the pendant must be cared for. To keep it shiny, one can either spray a light coat of Kamar Varnish (found in the craft section of most department stores), or brush the pendant’s surface with a thin coat of clear nail polish. The dulling of the resin’s exterior does in no way diminishes the energy flow of the harmonizers. One customer wrote - "It is beautiful. I have had tons of compliments and have people ask me where they can buy one. The pendant did get a bit hazy like they had told me it would from body heat, but I washed it and put a coat of clear nail polish on it and it is even more stunning."

Product_description: From the slopes to the backyard snow mounds, little boys will stay protected and warm in the Rewind Pant. This pant by Obermeyer is what every parent will want for his or her child. The Rewind Pant allows for warmth, comfort, durability and even style. With special designs and technology, this pant can withstand the elements. For starters, the pant offers a loose fit so that youngsters can be comfortable during snowy activities. There is also a special waistband built in to the pant to help keep out unwanted elements from entering. The technology on the Rewind Pant, however, is ultra impressive! This pant is made with technology and special fabrics including StormTech, Hydroblock V and Mosaic. StormTech is a 100% nylon mini-faille which is very durable, lightweight and comfortable. It is also a favorite for parents because it allows for fabrics to be long-lasting. Because of this, you can keep the Rewind pant for seasons to come. Hydroblock V is created with a polyurethane coating to keep the wearer dry, warm and comfortable. The dryer and more comfortable a kid is, the more happy he will be. The Rewind pant is also made with Mosaic fabric which is a proven 95% nylon and 5% polyester that is very much breathable and also treated with Obermeyer's microporous milky coating. (See bullet points to distinguish which pant color is created with which technology) Obermeyer knows how fast children grow, so the Extended Wear System was implemented into certain items and the Rewind Pant is one of them. The pant's waistlines very generous with an integrated elastic feature allowing adjustment to make the waist smaller as needed. Also, by snapping the colored threads, the pants can be lengthened up to two inches. Features: Reinforced Double Layer Seat and Knees, Reinforced Scuffguards, Reinforced Stitching, Zip Ankle Gussets, Front Fly and Pockets, Mosaic Fabric available in Ebony Plaid and Mercury Plaid. Product_description: Since Michael Akira West first stepped on a skateboard in the early eighties, he always had ideas in his head. Engulfed in the progressive street skateboarding scene in Hermosa and Venice Beach, Mike was introduced to snowboarding and found a new addiction and inspiration. Throughout the following years, Mike worked and rode at a local mountain in Big Bear, continually gathering and exploring new ideas. After finishing school at the University of Southern California, Mike realized that if he was going to do something on his own, it should begin when he had nothing to lose. Using punk, rap and jazz music as well as his collection of sneakers and vintage clothing as forms of inspiration, Mike got to work. On November 13, 1992, 686 technical apparel was formed. The 686 name comes from a crucial date in the life of Mike's grandmother (June 6th, 1986) and adds up to the age of when he started the company (6+8+6=20). Since the beginning, 686 has been about providing innovative, fashionable outerwear and technical apparel inspired from the same Los Angeles street culture and mountain lifestyle it was founded upon. Products like the trademarked Smarty line of removable liners, the Times line of limited edition co-branded products, the Plexus line of minimalist shell technology featuring technical fabrications featuring exclusive Infidry waterproof innovations, the patented Toolbelt line of functional belts and support of the DIY ethos all make up the 686 name. Being INDEPENDENTLY rider owned and operated and an obsession to make products progressively unique is what 686 is all about. Enjoy.

Catholics first popularized the tradition of wearing devotional medals during the Renaissance period to commemorate particular Saints, holy places or historical events. Many Catholics of the time would have personal medals cast to mark births and special sacraments such as Baptism and Confirmation, with the persons name and the date and give them out. Catholic medals also carry with them particular graces and indulgences for those who wear them. Today Catholic medals have become a refined art and are made of quality materials such as gold, silver and pewter. CARE ADVICE:

WOOL: Clothes made from wool and wool/silk are to be washed by hand with detergent for wool. Do not rub. Rinse with plenty of water. It is important, that rinsing and washing water have the same temperature. After rinsing wrap up the laundry in a towel, squeeze it and gently stretch it into shape. If possible dry flat.

title: Tibetan Mala Yak Bone Buddha of Compassion Wrist Mala Bracelet for Meditation
description: This listing is for a yak bone wrist mala with Buddha of compassion mantras. Each bead measures 8mm and handmade by Hands Of Tibet

Prayer Mala or beads are usually used by Buddhists around the world especially in Tibet, Nepal and India. On each Beads Carved with Six Tibetan syllable Mantra OM MANI PADME HUM and it is the mantra of Avalokteshwara the Buddha of compassion and It means HAIL TO THE JEWEL IN THE LOTUS.

Mani means jewel and padma means lotus. Malas are usually used for meditation, counting mantras, and prostration and those counters are especially for counting when you do prostration or in a retreat for counting mantras

Suggested Mantras for this mala "Om Muni Muni Maha Muni ye soha" To Lord Buddha Shakyamuni "Om Tare Turi Tutari Turi Soha" To White Tara "Tayatha Om Pekatse Pekatse Maha Pekatse Raza Samu Gati Soha" To medicine Buddha.

Product_description: Kidorable Blue Space Hero All-Weather Raincoats are available in sizes 1T, 2T, 3T, 4T, 4/5, 5/6, and 6/7. Like all Kidorable coats, they have a fun, comfy polyester lining and hood. To complete the outfit, get a matching Kidorable Space Hero umbrella, boots, backpack, knitwear and more! Most Kidorable products are designed for children aged 2-6. Many of our products are available for babies, and children as old as 11. Kidorable delights both children and the adults who love them by transforming everyday, functional kids' accessories into objects that excite their imaginations and enrich their lives at play. Find the gear your kids will actually beg to wear. Raincoats, Rain Boots, Umbrellas, Backpacks, Hooded Towels, Hanger Sets, Knit Gloves, Hats, and Scarves, and more. Here you’ll find styles to spark any kid’s imagination—Shark, Dinosaur, Lucky Cat, Ladybug, Butterfly, Frog, and Lotus for animal and nature lovers. Pirate, Fairy, Mermaid, Ballerina, Fireman, Space Hero, Dragon Knight and Fireman for kids who dream big. Plus Dora the Explorer and SpongeBob SquarePants for kids who want to be their favorite characters. We believe in the power of imagination to make everyday families happier. Because a lot is at stake. More and more, children are forgetting how to create, to think, to explore, to connect. Over-scheduled, under-engaged, dulled by TV and video games, our kids are less and less able to amuse themselves, solve their own problems, or tell the difference between the character in the movie and the one trying to sell them cereal on TV. It's time someone said there's a better way. Someone like us. Someone like you. It's time that children and the adults who love them rely more on human beings for connection and guidance and entertainment instead of screens with shiny lights and buttons. It's easy. All it takes is someone who cares. And a little imagination. Won't you join us?

Many of our products are available for babies, and children as old as 11. Kidorable delights both children and the adults who love them by transforming everyday, functional kids' accessories into objects that excite their imaginations and enrich their lives at play. Find the gear your kids will actually beg to wear. Raincoats, Rain Boots, Umbrellas, Backpacks, Hooded Towels, Hanger Sets, Knit Gloves, Hats, and Scarves, and more. Here you’ll find styles to spark any kid’s imagination—Shark, Dinosaur, Lucky Cat, Ladybug, Butterfly, Frog, and Lotus for animal and nature lovers. Pirate, Fairy, Mermaid, Ballerina, Fireman, Space Hero, Dragon Knight and Fireman for kids who dream big. Plus Dora the Explorer and SpongeBob SquarePants for kids who want to be their favorite characters. We believe in the power of imagination to make everyday families happier. Because a lot is at stake. More and more, children are forgetting how to create, to think, to explore, to connect. Over-scheduled, under-engaged, dulled by TV and video games, our kids are less and less able to amuse themselves, solve their own problems, or tell the difference between the character in the movie and the one trying to sell them cereal on TV. It's time someone said there's a better way. Someone like us. Someone like you. It's time that children and the adults who love them rely more on human beings for connection and guidance and entertainment instead of screens with shiny lights and buttons. It's easy. All it takes is someone who cares. And a little imagination. Won't you join us?

Product_description: “Share a heart, Share a Smile” is our motto. In awe of the Turkish handcrafted arts and the talent behind them, Valeri & Vera Antebi wanted to bring together their talent with their passion for design. Valeri & Vera found the talent and inspiration they were looking for, and the women found the hope of a better life they so desperately needed. One serendipitous day, luck brought them together with a group of very talented, but underprivileged society of rural women. ANTEBIES has the mission to empower women and most importantly give them hope for a better life that they so desperately are looking for. Each ANTEBIES product is ready to take their special place in the little hearts of their owners, and ready to change the lives of their creators.

ANTEBIES COLLECTION: Every person that was fortunate enough to have a doll in their childhood understands that a doll has a very special place in a child’s heart. But, an ANTEBIES doll represents much more than just that. It represents hope for the future, the wish for a better life, the passion for talent and respect for women’s labor. Our dolls are made with the finest organic materials and cherish the labor and love that is put into handcrafted arts. Each doll is hand crocheted by one of our gifted colleagues. After much success with our doll collection the ANTEBIES family continued their mission and created the most precious and adorable Organic Cotton Eco Friendly Kids Sleepwear, Playwear, Underwear and Loungewear. Besides for the exclusive fabric and style designs that we offer, each of our products have a handcrafted crochet heart finish, representing our motto. Our dolls and Clothing are guaranteed to capture the hearts of your precious children.

title: The North Face Boy's Glacier Track Jacket - (Past Season)
description: Extremely durable and lightweight micro-fleece track jacket.

Product_description: Take your family weekend adventures up a notch with this warm, lightweight and pill-resistant TKA micro-fleece jacket that features a tough taffeta overlay for even more durability. Secure-zip chest pocket holds small valuables. We are named for the coldest, most unforgiving side of a mountain. We have helped explorers reach the most unfathomable heights of the Himalayas. But The North Face legend begins, ironically, on a beach. More precisely, San Francisco's North Beach neighborhood, at an altitude of only 150 feet above sea level. It was here in 1966 that two hiking enthusiasts resolved to follow their passions and founded a small mountaineering retail store. From the beginning, the brand committed to serving all those who desired to explore and to serving our natural wild lands by helping to conserve them. At our core, we believe exploration creates an indelible bond with the outdoors, inspiring people to protect our land and pass these beliefs down to the next generation.
